content: स्वैर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्वस्य ईरम् ईर्-अच् वृद्धिः] {@--1@} Following one's own will or fancy, self-willed, wanton, uncontrolled, unrestrained; बद्धमिव स्वैरगतिर्जनमिह सुखसंगिनमवैमि <ls>Ś. 5. 11</ls>; अव्याहतैः स्वैरगतैः स तस्याः <ls>R. 2. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Free, unreserved, confidential; as in स्वैरालाप <ls>Mu. 4. 8.</ls> {@--3@} Slow, mild, gentle; <ls>Mu. 1. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Dull, lazy. {@--5@} Dependent on one's will, voluntary, optional. --रं Wilfulness, wantonness. --रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} At will or pleasure, as one likes, at perfect ease; सार्थाः स्वैरं स्वकीयेषु चेरुर्वेश्मस्विवाद्रिषु <ls>R. 17. 64.</ls> {@--2@} Of one's own accord, spontaneously. {@--3@} Slowly, gently, mildly; <ls>U. 3. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Lowly, in an under-tone. inaudibly, (<ab>opp.</ab> स्पष्ट); पश्चात्स्वैर गज इति किल व्याहृतं सत्यवाचा <ls>Ve. 3. 9.</ls>
